name: DUUUNGONs
description: Hi guys , this is our first Game jam i hope you enjoyed it , i fixed some bugs that made it unplayable and reuploaded it , sorry this is the first time using unity ( i'm a ue4 dev) and it took us 22h in total , we had fun making it and we did learn alot (PLAY TEST !! ) and we hope to do more game jams , anyway good luck for everyone and have fun !
